fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 89.45 points or 0.46% to settle at 19,543.10. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2.33% to 11.40. ZEE Entertainment Enterprises, HDFC Bank and Reliance Industries were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
